Title: Improves transparency in the insurance claims process
Summary: Improves transparency in the insurance claims process; regulates insurance adjusting professionals; institutes licensing standards for insurance professionals; ensures timely responses to insurance claims; enhances policyholder protections.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to improving transparency in the insurance claims process, regulating insurance adjusting professionals, instituting licensing standards for insurance professionals, ensuring timely responses to insurance claims, and enhancing policyholder protections
